import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Recipeingredients from './Recipeingredients' import { RecipeContext } from './App' function RecipeEdit({ recipe }) { const { handleRecipeChange } = useContext(RecipeContext) function handleChange(changes) { recipe.name = 'New Name' handleRecipeChange(recipe.id, {...recipe, ...changes}) } handleChange({ name: 'New Name'}) return (
handleChange({ name: e.target.value })}/> handleChange({ cookTime: e.target.value })}/> handleChange({ servings: parseInt(e.target.value) || 'not number' })}/>

Name
Amount
{recipe.ingredients.map(ingredient => ( ))} {/* ingredients */}
) } export default RecipeEdit
